{{Wireless embedded system |brand=8devices |model=Carambola |revision=2 |asin= |fcc_date=11/01/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=mini module |fcc_id=Z9W-CM2 |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128BVEG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6JB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (pins - req. breakout) |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=GPIO, I2C, I2S, SPDIF, SLIC |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} :[http://8devices.com/carambola-2 Product page]
*[http://8devices.com/wiki_carambola/doku.php '''8devices''' '''''Carambola Wiki'''''] *[https://github.com/8devices/carambola2 '''8devices''' ''github'' repo for their '''OpenWrt''' build] :[https://github.com/8devices/carambola2-packages '''''carambola2-packages''''' ''github'' repo] :[https://github.com/8devices/carambola2-luci '''''carambola2-luci''''' ''github'' repo]
Additional specifications, per '''8devices''' product page and datasheet, follow... :*Size: 28 mm x 38 mm :*Power supply: 3.3V :*Maximum power consumption: 0.5 W
